ZIP file containing materials for Rich's talk on producing figures
using matlab.

CONTENTS:

matlabFig.pdf - pdf of sides used in the talk

demoFigs.m - matlab script for successively generating figures

Plot1By2Demo.m - matlab function demonstrating how to modify one of my
shell scripts, called by demoFigs.m

demoFigs.pdf - pdf showing the figures generated using the matlab
script, demoFigs.m

demoFigs.tex - latex file for producing the above pdf

PlotXbyY.m - shell scripts that produce figures containt X by Y
axes. Plot1By2.m was used as a shell to produce the demo Plot1By2Demo.m 

nudgeLegend.m - matlab function for resizing the legend as this often
gets mucked up by matlab
